page.title: 10The Town Hall, Braintree
page.content: The Town Hall stands on the corner of Fairfield Road and Market Square. For many years this splendid building housed the main offices for Braintree and Distict Town Council, however when Causeway House was built this fine establishment was turned into a Centre for the Arts. The one time council offices now are the home of many exhibitions on a wide varietty of topics. The Braintree and Bocking Herritage Trust stage many of their presentations in these halls, giving an insight into the history of our beautiful town, for the local population. During the year some fine paintings are put on display in this gallery. Courses on Art and Craft are also held within these walls. Much work is done by the Braintree Arts Council and their president Mr.I. Williams.
